Text:
thanks for starting this over!  Please seed though everybody!  I'm stuck at 14%!  Thank you in advance!

seriously though, dimlan, you're my hero.

Thanks a lot dimlan!

I hope you can post the other volumes in the series.
Agreed... thank you for starting this series over for those of us who missed them.  You rock Dim!
Thank You! Thank You! But...If this is the "final" *fixed* version, perhaps it should be labeled as v3.0 just to avoid any confusion.
Many thanks to Dim for this great series, and extra special thanks for starting over, since I missed it first time around. Keep up the good work!

Wow, dimlan. Thank you so much! Sorry it took me so long to comment, I'm up to chronology #8 now. All the books I could never dream of affording and reading growing up in the 80's.. All the stories I always wished I knew. Thank you so much. It means more than I could ever say.
I know this is a very very very long shot, but can anyone who still has this, seed it please? It would be amazing to read all of marvel from the beginning. Thank you.
Just came back to my computer and the download has started, at 1kb/s lol. I'm willing to wait the 6 days it will take to download so thank you to whoever is seeding!!
